ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Certainly it is guidance and a mercy for the muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is a guidance and grace for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and it is a guidance and mercy for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is a guide and mercy for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed it is a guidance and a mercy for the Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And truly, it is a guide and a mercy for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely it is a guidance and a mercy for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: it is a guidance, and a mercy unto the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! it is a guidance and a mercy for believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: certainly it is guidance and a blessing for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily it is a guidance and a mercy unto the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and it is indeed a guidance and mercy for the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And it certainly is a Guide and a Mercy to those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And truly, it (this Quran) is a guide and a mercy to the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is a guidance and a mercy to believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is guidance and mercy for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, it is guidance and mercy for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:77] And truly it is a guidance, from error, and a mercy for believers, from chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! It) i.e. the Qur'an (is a guidance) from error (and a mercy) shielding from the torment (for believers) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.
